sentences.sContent: Dario played the sonata with great finesse.
sentences.sCn: 达里奥以高超的技艺弹奏了这首奏鸣曲。

trans.tranOther: if you do something with finesse, you do it with a lot of skill and style

trans.tranCn: 巧妙处理；以偷牌方式先出
trans.tranOther: to handle a situation well, but in a way that is slightly deceitful
